physicalDescription.extent: The papers are filed in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 54; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains monthly pay bills for the Indian Assistant, Bahrain (Dr S M Siddiq, later Mohamed Abdul Hafiz), from April 1943 to February 1945 inclusive; and accompanying monthly schedules of deductions made for the General Provident Fund.
